thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: Michael J. Wilson
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Michael J. Wilson

author: Michael J. Wilson
title: Michael J. Wilson
text: I was a little bit skeptical about Pop Yachts at first but I signed on after some research with hesitation. Eric my rep was a great guy and keep me informed with weekly updates. He did everything he and pop yachts said they would do. They can reach so many potential buyers. I would recommend them to anyone trying to sell your boat. Michael Wilson
